innoWorks_hero_title:
Sparkling ideas into reality,
Inno Works
innoWorks_hero_subtitle:
Create everything you imagine with Friender Inno Works.
Make your own works like coding, drawing, and music, and boost your creativity by presenting them with friends!
innoWorks_hero_desc: Imagine, create, and present with AI to boost creativity!
innoWorks_ai_tools_desc: AI is a tool that turns ideas into drawings and text. You can create imaginative worlds without coding knowledge.
innoWorks_inventor_desc: Start invention projects to solve everyday inconveniences. You can create things like 'a robot that automatically sorts trash' or 'an app that finds lost animals.'
innoWorks_presentation_desc: Freely present games, animations, and inventions created in Inno Works. View friends' works and learn from each other.
innoWorks_for_parents_desc: Inno Works is an educational program that helps children develop creative thinking, problem-solving skills, and digital literacy through safe and creative AI technology.
innoWorks_cta_title: Ready to create your own work?
innoWorks_cta_desc: Imagine, create, and present with AI to boost creativity!
